Text: Thanks - this one obviously has some seeders with their upload speeds set at reasonable levels. A shame the more populated one is populated with what seem like a bunch of stingy Brits who all seem to have their u/ls extremely limited to the point of silliness...

You're welcome.

Unfortunately, most people in the UK use ADSL broadband (only one company offers fibre optic), so the upload speed is much lower: around 30-50kb/s.
